title: Describing a Past Trip
description: Write about a trip you took in the past.

prompt.description: Describe a trip you took. Tell where you went, who you traveled with, what you did, and how you felt about it.
requirements: Include where you went and when
Describe at least 2-3 activities you did
Share your feelings about the trip
Use time expressions (last year, two days ago, etc.)

exampleSentences.sentence: Last summer, I went to Busan with my friends.
exampleSentences.translation: 지난 여름, 저는 친구들과 부산에 갔습니다.
exampleSentences.useCase: Opening sentence - where and with whom

exampleSentences.sentence: We stayed at a hotel near the beach for three days.
exampleSentences.translation: 우리는 해변 근처 호텔에서 3일 동안 머물렀습니다.

exampleSentences.sentence: We visited Haeundae Beach and ate delicious seafood.
exampleSentences.translation: 우리는 해운대 해변을 방문하고 맛있는 해산물을 먹었습니다.

exampleSentences.sentence: The weather was perfect for swimming.
I had a wonderful time and want to go back soon.
exampleSentences.translation: 정말 즐거운 시간을 보냈고 곧 다시 가고 싶습니다.

vocabularyHelp.example: I went to Japan last month.
We stayed at a nice hotel.
I came back two weeks ago.

items: Did you include where you went?
Did you mention when you went?
Did you say who you traveled with?
Did you share how you felt about the trip?
Did you use past tense verbs correctly?
Did you avoid common mistakes (goed -> went)?
Are your sentences complete with subjects and verbs?
Did you use time expressions properly?
Does your writing have a clear beginning?
Is the middle part well organized?
Does it have a good conclusion?
Is your writing at least 60 words?
Did you check for spelling mistakes?
Did you complete it within the time limit?
